channel.title: Totally Unepic Grand Idea Turbo [Game over - Blue Dragon and Mad King win!]
channel.description:
# [color=grey]Grand Idea Turbo[/color]
* It will start 3 minutes after it fills. * Days are 15 minutes. Nights are 5 minutes. * Logs do ***not*** exist. * Lynches are majority only. * Trials exist. * There can be more than one King, but only a King election will take place once there are no Kings remaining. * I’m on a laptop atm. * The amount of players are infinite but there must be at least 8 players. * Classes will be at least 50% BD/Uninformed Majority-siding.
Players:
0. Geyde - Forever Dead Inside 1. Margaret - Alive 2. PoisonedSquid :crown: - Dead, Mad King 3. H_Hjasik - Dead, Lv. 35 Boss 4. ~~MaximusPrime~~ Insanity - Alive 5. DatBird - Dead, Court Wizard 6. ~~Mercenary~~ Kai_5 - Alive 7. ~~Pug~~ Firekitten :crown: - Alive but dead inside ...
# Classes will be rolled up to class 1204.

item.description:

Ultra-ultra-hard mode fool

Has no abilities, is revealed as an Innocent child at the beginning of the game.
Goal: Get lynched D1.

Emilia:

this is you squid

Lowkey impressed with how quickly Hjasik picked up on this.
